SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.gender, u.avatar, u.STATUS, u.email, d.NAME AS dept_name, ur.roleNames, u.create_time FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT r.user_id, LISTAGG(sur.name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY sur.name) AS roleNames FROM sys_user_role r LEFT JOIN sys_role sur ON r.role_id = sur.id GROUP BY r.user_id ) ur ON u.id = ur.user_id
u.is_deleted = 0
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role sur INNER JOIN sys_role r ON sur.role_id = r.id WHERE sur.user_id = u.id AND r.code = '${@com.youlai.boot.common.constant.SystemConstants@ROOT_ROLE_CODE}' )
AND ( u.username LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' OR u.nickname LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' OR u.mobile LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' )
AND u.status = #{queryParams.status}
AND ',' || d.tree_path || ',' || d.id || ',' LIKE '%,' || #{queryParams.deptId} || ',%'
AND TRUNC(u.create_time) >= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.createTime[0]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(u.create_time) <= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.createTime[1]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ur.user_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT sur.user_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id IN
#{roleId}
)
ORDER BY u.id DESC
